title: Is revenge a bad attitude? - Quora

response.answer_text: Be it revenge,happiness,sadness or envy..all these are are state of mind and they don't stay forever.However if suppose you want revenge & inturn hurt or cause harm to the other person then i would say YES!!IT IS A BAD ATTITUDE..But instead if you choose not to hurt IT IS A THE BEST HARM YOU COULD YOU TO SOMEONE..because this will make the other person regret his deeds..So next time when you have a feeling of revenge...Be proactive and choose not to hurt back..it does no good but instead be polite and let go off that moment and trust me you will fell better

Anger is like a hot piece of coal that you're holding in your hand and expecting the other person to burn- BuddhaEven if you had your revenge, it's no surity that you'll be the one to have the last laugh.Shit happens. Wipe it wash it and move on. It's for your own good

There is a Chinese saying...  "If you want to take revenge from someone, you should dig 2 graves."EDIT    there is a funny one also....    "I am to lazy to take revenge, I will just sit back and wait for the KARMA to to the all work" (Anonymous)
